text: Boebe or Boibe () was a town in ancient Crete, which was in the Gortynian district. Scholars tentatively locate Boebe at the modern village of Pompia in the municipal unit of Moires, municipality of Faistos, regional unit of Heraklion. ==References== Category:Populated places in ancient Crete Category:Former populated places in Greece
title: Boebe (Crete)
